thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good airport hotel with great views
thread.title_full: Good airport hotel with great views - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: YCW7
title: Good airport hotel with great views
text:
When using mobile check-in, I requested a room facing the runway (since I do enjoying watching planes taking off and landing) and selected extra amenity kits. The room I was assigned was not those along the bay, so the view was kind of limited/blocked due to hotel layout.
Although the M Lounge offered quite standard (if not somewhat limited) hot items during happy hour, I found the breakfast options were quite satisfactory. The staff at the lounge was not as attentive/warm as those I encountered at the downtown Marriott/JW Marriott though.
